pages.title: Storage Node
pages.text: The Storage Node will show their greatest use in combination with [Sender Nodes](book://pastel_network/sender_node) (will push to it) and [Gather Nodes](book://pastel_network/gather_node) (will pull from it).\\Its [#](449900)filter[#]() allows you to specify which items it will receive & provide. An empty filter makes it act as a general storage for all types of items.
